quotes: In 1981 he received his doctorate in economics from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology in Cambridge, Massachusetts in the US.
He maintained his connections to MIT, in part as a professor of economics from 1984 to 1991.
Since 1992 he has worked at the School of Economics at the University of Toulouse in France.
Since the mid-1980s, Jean Tirole has worked to develop a coherent theory, for example showing that regulation should be adapted to suit specific conditions in each industry.

quotes: After having studied engineering at the Ecole Polytechnique and Ecole Nationale des Ponts et Chaussées in Paris, he turned his interests to economics and mathematics.
